greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Limit of rows in rectangular array A292929.
comment: The g.f. of A292929 is R(x,q) = sqrt( Q(x,q) / Q(x,-q) ), where Q(x,q) = Sum_{n=-oo..+oo} (x - q^n)^n; the g.f. of this sequence equals the limit of the coefficient of x^n in  R(x,q) / q^n  as a power series in q.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: Let R(x,q) be the g.f. of A292929, then we can illustrate the g.f. of this sequence as follows.
The coefficient of x^4 in R(x,q) begins:
The coefficient of x^5 in R(x,q) begins:
The coefficient of x^6 in R(x,q) begins:
The g.f. A(q) equals the limit of the coefficient if x^n in R(x,q)/q^n.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 22 2017
